intro.speaker: spirit
intro.text: {playerName}... Can you hear me? You must wake up...

intro.speaker: spirit
intro.text: The world has changed while you slumbered. Darkness spreads across the land.

intro.speaker: player
intro.text: Who... who are you? Where am I?

intro.speaker: spirit
intro.text: I am your spirit guide. I have waited centuries for your return, {playerName}.

intro.speaker: spirit
intro.text: You are the Legend spoken of in ancient prophecies. Only you can save this world.

intro.speaker: player
intro.text: I... I don't remember anything. But I feel a power awakening within me...

intro.speaker: spirit
intro.text: Your memories will return in time. For now, we must travel to the nearby village.

intro.speaker: spirit
intro.text: The Mayor there can help us understand what has happened to the realm.

firstVillage.speaker: mayor
firstVillage.text: By the ancient ones! Could it be? The Returner has finally awakened!

firstVillage.speaker: mayor
firstVillage.text: The legends speak of you, {playerName}. You disappeared a thousand years ago during the Great Cataclysm.

firstVillage.speaker: mayor
firstVillage.text: When darkness threatened to consume everything, you sacrificed yourself to seal away the Shadow King.

firstVillage.speaker: spirit
firstVillage.text: But the seal is weakening. That's why {playerName} has returned.

firstVillage.speaker: mayor
firstVillage.text: Then the prophecy is coming true... Monsters have been appearing from the Whispering Woods.

firstVillage.speaker: mayor
firstVillage.text: Please, {playerName}, help us! Clear the forest of these creatures and find out what's happening.

firstVillage.speaker: player
firstVillage.text: I will do what I can. Something tells me this is my destiny.

forestCleared.speaker: spirit
forestCleared.text: Well done, {playerName}! Your skills are returning to you.

forestCleared.speaker: player
forestCleared.text: That creature... it wasn't natural. Something corrupted it.

forestCleared.speaker: spirit
forestCleared.text: Yes. The Shadow King's influence grows stronger. We must find the source of this corruption.

forestCleared.speaker: spirit
forestCleared.text: Return to the village. I sense something important awaits us there.

guildIntro.speaker: guildMaster
guildIntro.text: So you're the one they call the Returner! I'm the local Guild Master.

guildIntro.speaker: guildMaster
guildIntro.text: The Adventurer's Guild spans all the major towns in the realm.

guildIntro.speaker: player
guildIntro.text: A guild? I'd like to join.

guildIntro.speaker: guildMaster
guildIntro.text: You've already proven yourself by clearing the forest. Welcome, {playerName}!

guildIntro.speaker: guildMaster
guildIntro.text: You'll start at Rank F. Complete quests to raise your rank and unlock better rewards.

guildIntro.speaker: guildMaster
guildIntro.text: Check the quest board anytime. We're counting on you, Legend!

cryptsEntry.speaker: spirit
cryptsEntry.text: These are the Ancient Crypts... I sense great darkness here.

cryptsEntry.speaker: player
cryptsEntry.text: Something feels familiar about this place.

cryptsEntry.speaker: spirit
cryptsEntry.text: This is where you first battled the Shadow King's generals, a thousand years ago.

cryptsEntry.speaker: spirit
cryptsEntry.text: Be careful, {playerName}. The dead do not rest easy here.

lichDefeated.speaker: player
lichDefeated.text: The Lich... it spoke of a master. The Shadow King must be awakening.

lichDefeated.speaker: spirit
lichDefeated.text: Indeed. Each boss you defeat weakens the seal... but also weakens the Shadow King's generals.

lichDefeated.speaker: spirit
lichDefeated.text: It's a race against time. We must defeat them all before the seal breaks completely.

forgottenCityEntry.speaker: spirit
forgottenCityEntry.text: The Forgotten City... This was once a thriving metropolis.

forgottenCityEntry.speaker: player
forgottenCityEntry.text: I remember... I lived here. Before everything changed.

forgottenCityEntry.speaker: spirit
forgottenCityEntry.text: Your memories are returning, {playerName}. This is good.

forgottenCityEntry.speaker: spirit
forgottenCityEntry.text: But be warned - the city is now overrun with corrupted machines from the old era.

volcanoEntry.speaker: spirit
volcanoEntry.text: Mount Inferno... The Dragon Lord's domain.

volcanoEntry.speaker: player
volcanoEntry.text: I can feel the heat from here. This won't be easy.

volcanoEntry.speaker: spirit
volcanoEntry.text: The Dragon Lord was once your ally, {playerName}. But the Shadow King corrupted him.

volcanoEntry.speaker: spirit
volcanoEntry.text: Defeating him may break the corruption... or it may be too late.

shadowCastleEntry.speaker: spirit
shadowCastleEntry.text: This is it, {playerName}. The Shadow Castle. The final battle awaits.

shadowCastleEntry.speaker: player
shadowCastleEntry.text: I can feel him... The Shadow King. He knows we're coming.

shadowCastleEntry.speaker: spirit
shadowCastleEntry.text: You've grown so powerful on this journey. I believe in you.

shadowCastleEntry.speaker: spirit
shadowCastleEntry.text: Remember - you sealed him once before. You can do it again. Permanently this time.

finalBattle.speaker: shadowKing
finalBattle.text: So... the Returner has finally come. I've been expecting you, {playerName}.

finalBattle.speaker: player
finalBattle.text: Your reign of terror ends here, Shadow King!

finalBattle.speaker: shadowKing
finalBattle.text: A thousand years... I've had a thousand years to grow stronger while you slept.

finalBattle.speaker: shadowKing
finalBattle.text: This time, there will be no sealing. Only DESTRUCTION!

victory.speaker: spirit
victory.text: You did it, {playerName}! The Shadow King is defeated... truly defeated this time.

victory.speaker: player
victory.text: It's finally over... The world is safe.

victory.speaker: spirit
victory.text: Your legend will be remembered for all eternity. You are truly the greatest hero this world has ever known.

victory.speaker: spirit
victory.text: But our journey doesn't have to end here. There are still challenges to face... if you're ready.

victory.speaker: player
victory.text: I am {playerName}, the Evol Legend. I was born for this. Let's go!
